name: inadvertency
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the quality of not being intentional: Through inadvertency, negligence, or bad luck, he has injured himself in a way that he did not intend. I am not at all convinced that the disclosure was due to inadvertency. Synonym
inadvertence
[ C ] an action or event that is unintentional: Most people know that life, like history, is made up of inadvertencies. There are quite a few typographical errors and inadvertencies.
More examplesFewer examplesIt happened, however, through inadvertency.Her exclamations and confessions seemed filled with inadvertencies.
